questions.clue: This creature from Greek mythology is a winged horse that sprang from the blood of Medusa.

This scientist's 1928 discovery of penicillin led to the development of antibiotics.

The structure of DNA was first described as a double helix in 1953 by these two scientists.
This physicist's 1905 papers on special relativity introduced the famous equation E=mc².
This staple grain, first cultivated over 10,000 years ago in the Fertile Crescent, is a cornerstone of many diets worldwide.

final.clue: This 1955 novel, whose title character shares a name with the author's daughter, was famously rejected by multiple publishers before becoming a modern classic.
